    • Method Detail

      • setMaxHealth

        @Deprecated
public boolean setMaxHealth(int maxHealth)
        Deprecated. 

      • setMaxHealth

        public boolean setMaxHealth(double maxHealth)
        Sets the monsters maximum health. This value may only be set if the monsters current health is equal to it's current maximum (it hasn't taken damage yet). Furthermore this operation should realistically only be done once per monster. This will return false if the monster's current health and maximum do not match. This operation is not thread-safe
        Parameters:
        maxHealth -
        Returns:
        true if the operation completed successfully.

      • getSpawnReason

        public org.bukkit.event.entity.CreatureSpawnEvent.SpawnReason getSpawnReason()
        Gets the reason that this monster was spawned, useful for tracking entities that were spawned from a monster spawner. This method can return null.
        Returns:
        spawnReason
